prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that has a sturdy appearance and a striking blue color.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a statue, with a prominent red nose and a blue body.
Generate a unique Pokemon design that embodies the spirit of mountains with a solid, blocky shape.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a rock formation, featuring a bright red accent on its face.
Make a Pokemon that is inspired by ancient artifacts, with a hard exterior and an unusual color scheme.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of geology and mythology, showcasing a vivid blue hue.
Give me a Pokemon that has a strong resemblance to a compass with a vibrant red nose.
